_comment_rocks: Number of rocks to spawn per image (random between min and max)
_comment_spawn: Spawn area bounds in Blender units. Rocks spawn randomly within this box.
_comment_z_jitter: Random Z offset added to z_base for layering effect
_comment_scale: Scale distribution: [probability_threshold, min_scale, max_scale]. Evaluated in order - if random() < threshold, use that range. Example: [0.80, 0.05, 0.25] means 80% chance of scale 0.05-0.25
